name: BOTS 'N SHOTS
description:
"BOTS 'N SHOTS" is a fast paced 3D First Person shooter that requires alot of skill to beat! 

Story & Gameplay

An alien ship crashed into the mountain soon 4 other followed now you must kill them all before they take over the planet 

The only way you can take them all out by yourself is to nuke the entire valley sacrificing yourself but also saving the human race 

You must kill all 4 bosses to assemble the nuke and then jump into the campfire detonating the nuke, saving earth but sacrificing yourself in the process

Support
  • Join the Discord server to share some feedback and follow new projects
